mean_cn: n. 抽出，取出，【化】提取（法）萃取法，抽出物，家世
mean_en: the act or process of getting something by pulling it out, forcing it out, etc. :the act of extracting something
word_etyma: extract取出 + ion名词后缀 → extraction 取出
sentence: I'm afraid the extraction of your tooth may be quite painful.
sentence_trans: 恐怕拔掉你的牙会很痛。
